messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] linkneeded
messages.messageBody:
on 3/22/03 12:02 PM, encadia@... at encadia@... wrote:

> Anyone have a favorite site
> to look for a walkthrough for
> a playstation game.

gamefaq.com

Really good.

Joyce

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] linkneeded
messages.msgSnippet: Try www.gamefaqs.com and do a search on the game title.  Click on the tabs across the top for guides/walkthroughs, codes etc.  The kids use it all the time.
messages.messageBody:
Try www.gamefaqs.com and do a search on the game title. Click on the tabs across the top for guides/walkthroughs, codes etc. The kids use it all the time.

Pam L
----- Original Message -----
From: encadia@...
To: Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Saturday, March 22, 2003 12:02 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] linkneeded


Anyone have a favorite site
to look for a walkthrough for
a playstation game.

Linda

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] linkneeded
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/22/03 10:04:15 AM, encadia@aol.com writes:  At the
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/22/03 10:04:15 AM, encadia@... writes:

<< Anyone have a favorite site
to look for a walkthrough for
a playstation game. >>

At the bottom of an article by Dan Vilter there are links:

http://sandradodd.com/games/cheats

and you can always use google.com and put in walkthrough or cheats and the
name of the game.
Newer games aren't in, but sometimes there are message boards where kids are
asking and answering specific questions.

Sandra
